title: A buncha random shit

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - When this role is rolled, you get three random abilities from three random roles and three random attributes from three other random roles. The host must do their diddly darn best to interpret your rolecard in a way that makes some amount of sense.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the Town lose the game.
